Title: Episode #1.5
Writer: Paolo Sorrentino, Paolo Sorrentino (created by), Peppe Fiore (story editor)
Actors: Jude Law, Diane Keaton, Silvio Orlando, Scott Shepherd
Plot: The Pope takes an unscheduled trip away from the Vatican, Voiello has a crisis of conscience, and the Cardinals are finally given their audience with the pontiff.
